p: The hydrologic model HEC-HMS was used to simulate flood hydrographs over the Adyar sub-basin. The model simulated a hydrograph with a peak discharge of 3141 m 3/s for December 2015 rainfall event. Since there was no observation of that particular event, experts suggested that a peak discharge was approximately above 2800 m 3/s [ 47, 48]. Evidently, there was a fair agreement between model simulation and the opinion of experts.
